title: DISCOVERY -- Sci-Fi Atmospheric Music Vol. I
description: Music pack containing 10 high fidelity Sci-Fi & Atmospheric tracks.
longDescription:
This pack contains ten pieces of music designed mainly for Open World, Sci-Fi or Futuristic RPGs. They will also fit any mysterious atmospheric project from games to trailers or advertising. The tracks were tested in various conditions (Headphones: studio/consumer, Speakers :PC and TV HI-FI /consumer, Studio Monitors) to offer the best possible result.


Being also a game developer I understand the necessity of asset continuity so this pack is the first of a series that will develop according to public request. All the tracks are handcrafted using multiple sound layers and harmonies avoiding one key strokes and repetition of premade sound libraries.


Album Trailer on SoundCloud

Album Playlist on YouTube (Made in UE4)

For any questions or custom work: Alex.M


Vision  - 3.09 min

------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------

Enjoy and Thank you for your time!
technicalDetails:
Features:

 High fidelity.

 High Quality Mix and Master.

 Easily combined with other music genres.

 First of multiple similar packs.

 Specially composed for smooth transition to/from other tracks.

 2 Additional UE4 Exclusive Tracks


Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10
